structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIIIA. SOUTH FLORIDA CULTURAL CONSORTIUM

text.section:
Sec. 2-300.2. Membership.
The membership of the Consortium shall be composed of the Chair of each county's cultural council responsible for matters relating to culture and the arts and the executive Director of each county cultural council, or such other Council staff member as the county manager or county administrator for each respective county may designate.
Members shall serve without compensation but may be reimbursed from consortium funds for actual authorized expenses incurred in the discharge of their duties as provided below.
